ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
“…The town was quiet.”{PAUSE}“Everyone must be in their houses,
afraid to come out because of the monsters.”{PAUSE}“No, maybe they're afraid of us…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Cloud}
“It's too dangerous!
I can't get you involved in this!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Tifa}
“I'll be all right, Dad!”{PAUSE}“I have two men from SOLDIER with me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Tifa}
“I'm {Tifa}.
Nice to meet you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Tifa}
“That's right.”{PAUSE}“It so happens I'm the
number one guide in this town.”

ops.raw: a5 00 00 fa 01 d8 fd ff ff 0a 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // Sephiroth
“Once the guide gets here, we're heading out.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // Sephiroth
“There's no problem if you protect her.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Sephiroth
“We leave for the reactor at dawn.
Make sure you get to sleep early.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Sephiroth
“All we need is one lookout,
so you others, get some rest.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Sephiroth
“You may visit your family and friends.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “Hey, if you don't calm down,
you won't get a good evaluation…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Look, you never know when a monster's
gonna show up, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “…That's right.
Don't blow your chance to become a hero…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:52}); // “I was so nervous.
I couldn't get any sleep…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // “Think they'd let me take a picture?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // “I don't take pictures
of nobodys.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // “All right…
{GRAY}Fat-head…{WHITE}”{PAUSE}“Hey?
{GRAY}This guy's a real…{WHITE}”{PAUSE}“You…
Are you {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“Really?
So that's how it is, huh?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // “Let's do this, {Cloud}.
Let me take a picture of you with Sephiroth.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // “OK, OK…
{GRAY}Fat-head…{WHITE}
{GRAY}You're just his assistant.{WHITE}”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // “Mr. Sephiroth!
Please let me take one picture for a memento!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // “{Tifa}, can you ask
him for me too?”
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:255, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:45}); // “I'll give each of you a copy
once I get it developed!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Tifa}'s father
“Until we know that there's no danger,
we're not moving.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Tifa}'s father
“I hate myself for asking you this, but…”{PAUSE}“Don't take your eyes off of {Tifa}!
Hurry up and go back to her side!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // {Tifa}'s father
“If I knew this was going to happen,
I would've made mountain climbing off limits…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // {Tifa}'s father
“We don't need the Shinra's help to
protect our town!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Tifa}'s father
“…Stay away from my daughter.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}'s father
“Listen to me, Sephiroth.
In case something happens…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:56}); // Zangan
“The Shinra showed up to eliminate
any information that could be
embarrassing to the company.”{PAUSE}“You pick these things up when
you travel as much as I do.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:55}); // {Cloud}
“It's Sephiroth.
He would never do that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:57}); // Zangan
“…Oh my.
You sure do have faith.”

dialogStrings: Nibelheim

{Cloud}
“…The town was quiet.”{PAUSE}“Everyone must be in their houses,
afraid to come out because of the monsters.”{PAUSE}“No, maybe they're afraid of us…”

Sephiroth
“We leave for the reactor at dawn.
Make sure you get to sleep early.”

Sephiroth
“All we need is one lookout,
so you others, get some rest.”

Sephiroth
“Oh, and…”

Sephiroth
“You may visit your family and friends.”

“Man…
I'm so nervous.”
{CHOICE}How come?
{CHOICE}I'm excited.

“Look, you never know when a monster's
gonna show up, right?”

“…That's right.
Don't blow your chance to become a hero…”

“Hey, if you don't calm down,
you won't get a good evaluation…”

“Hmm? You from Shinra?”
{CHOICE}That's right!
{CHOICE}Who are you?

“Geez…
Big-headed young kid.”

“I'm the town's…
….
…!?”
“Aren't you {Cloud}?”
“Don't you know me?”

{Cloud}
“You're {Tifa}'s…”

“Right.
I'm {Tifa}'s father.”

{Cloud}
“…Long time no see, sir.”

{Tifa}'s father
“…Stay away from my daughter.”

{Tifa}'s father
“We don't need the Shinra's help to
protect our town!”

{Tifa}'s father
“If I knew this was going to happen,
I would've made mountain climbing off limits…”

{Tifa}'s father
“I hate myself for asking you this, but…”{PAUSE}“Don't take your eyes off of {Tifa}!
Hurry up and go back to her side!”

{Tifa}'s father
“Until we know that there's no danger,
we're not moving.”

“I heard Sephiroth was coming
so I brought my camera.”{PAUSE} “I want a shot of
Sephiroth and a monster.”
{CHOICE}Take my picture.
{CHOICE}Get back in the house, it's dangerous.

“I don't take pictures
of nobodys.”

“All right…
{GRAY}Fat-head…{WHITE}”{PAUSE}“Hey?
{GRAY}This guy's a real…{WHITE}”{PAUSE}“You…
Are you {Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“Really?
So that's how it is, huh?”

“Gosh, {Cloud},
you've grown up to be a nice-looking lad.”
{CHOICE}Then take my picture
{CHOICE}It's dangerous, go home

“Let's do this, {Cloud}.
Let me take a picture of you with Sephiroth.”

“OK, OK…
{GRAY}Fat-head…{WHITE}
{GRAY}You're just his assistant.{WHITE}”
“Think they'd let me take a picture?”
“What's Sephiroth doing?”

Sephiroth
“Once the guide gets here, we're heading out.”

{Tifa}'s father
“Listen to me, Sephiroth.
In case something happens…”

Sephiroth
“…Trust me.”

{Tifa}
“I'll be all right, Dad!”{PAUSE}“I have two men from SOLDIER with me.”

{Tifa}
“I'm {Tifa}.
Nice to meet you!”

{Cloud}
“{Tifa}!
You're the guide?”

{Tifa}
“That's right.”{PAUSE}“It so happens I'm the
number one guide in this town.”

{Cloud}
“It's too dangerous!
I can't get you involved in this!”

Sephiroth
“There's no problem if you protect her.”

Sephiroth
“…Let's go.”
“Umm…”

“Mr. Sephiroth!
Please let me take one picture for a memento!”

“{Tifa}, can you ask
him for me too?”
“Great, thank you!”

“I'll give each of you a copy
once I get it developed!”
“Cheeeeese!”

{Cloud}
“This Mansion…”{PAUSE}“…No, I'll come here later.”

Sephiroth
“Hey, stay over here!”

{Cloud}
“Up ahead is…Mt. Nibel.”{PAUSE}“I'll tell you about the time
I went into the mountains.”

“Hey, calm down!
Wait over here.”
“…Late again.”

“I was so nervous.
I couldn't get any sleep…”

Zangan
“There's nothing that'll
harm the town, right?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Why?
{CHOICE}No way!

{Cloud}
“…Why do you ask?”

{Cloud}
“It's Sephiroth.
He would never do that.”

Zangan
“The Shinra showed up to eliminate
any information that could be
embarrassing to the company.”{PAUSE}“You pick these things up when
you travel as much as I do.”

Zangan
“…Oh my.
You sure do have faith.”

“Is that you, {Cloud}?”
…Yeah
…No
“Mom?”
“Here, I've brought you something!”
“Don't tell anyone in town!”
Received "Homemade Potion!”
